publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-726 Hugh O’Donnell: Showmens Guild, Scottish Section—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish section of the Showmens Guild on the occasion of its centenary year; recognises the substantial contribution that has been made to the leisure and pleasure pursuits of the people of Scotland by the fairs and shows provided by guild members, and believes that the showpeople’s lifestyle and culture are an integral and valued part of Scotland’s heritage and should be given due and equal consideration when the Parliament is considering relevant legislation and initiatives.

S3M-726 Hugh O’Donnell: Showmens Guild, Scottish Section—That the Parliament congratulates the Scottish section of the Showmens Guild on the occasion of its centenary year; recognises the substantial contribution that has been made to the leisure and pleasure pursuits of the people of Scotland by the fairs and shows provided by guild members, and believes that the showpeople’s lifestyle and culture are an integral and valued part of Scotland’s heritage and should be given due and equal consideration when the Parliament is considering relevant legislation and initiatives.
S3M-726 Showmens Guild, Scottish Section (lodged on 30 October 2007) Christine Grahame*, Jamie McGrigor*
